verbs.description: [ARG0: hp] [V: boosts] [ARG1: its zbooks] [ARG2: with intel core i9 processors] it was n't that long ago when hp launched the zbook x360 but it already giving the convertible and the other devices in the lineup a hardware refresh the stu z club intel xavier garcia hp intel core
